PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_OnSiteTelecomControlUnit
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties for on-site telecom control unit used for railway.

PropertyDef.Name: HasEarthquakeAlarm
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the on-site control unit includes earthquake alarm function.

PropertyDef.Name: HasEarthquakeCollection
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the on-site control unit collects earthquake information.

PropertyDef.Name: HasForeignObjectCollection
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the on-site control unit collects foreign object information.

PropertyDef.Name: ControllerInterfaceType
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the type of serial interface used by the device.

PropertyDef.Name: HasOutputFunction
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the on-site control unit includes an output function.

PropertyDef.Name: HasRainCollection
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the on-site control unit collects information on rain.

PropertyDef.Name: HasSnowCollection
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the on-site control unit collects information on snow depth.

PropertyDef.Name: HasWindCollection
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the on-site control unit collects information on wind.
